<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# ZSuper Node Formatting

Represents a `super` call without arguments and parentheses

It's different from `super()` as it implicitly forwards current arguments

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
super
```

After:

```ruby
super
```

## Formats recursively

Before:

```ruby
super super
```

After:

```ruby
super super
```
